name: Fill Fit Block
description:
1. "Fill Fit Block" is an extremely simple and adducing puzzle game.
2. It has a Tetris style, but the gameplay is very different.
3. The operation is very easy, just drag and drop the block to the fit place.
4. Two game modes: Square and Hexagon.
5. Each mode has five sub modes: Classic, Time, Rotate, Bomb and Missions.
6. Each sub mode has a unique gameplay.
7. Nearly 4500 missions are waiting for you to complete.
8. It can both pass your time and train your brain.
9. Try it now！Maybe once you start, you will love it!

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at contact@mudotek.com.
